dct_title_s: De beschryvingh van de Reysen Pauli, en van de andere Apostelen
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Gemeene duytsche Mylen" and "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, land and sea travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes 8 pictorial vignettes along the top and bottom showing scenes of the travels of St. Paul and the Apostles.
Features illustrations of ships and settlements throughout map; illustrations of cherubs surrounding pictorial vignettes of St. Paul and the Apostles.
